participant_1.background:
I remember playing in the rain with my siblings, not caring about the world.
I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it.
My dog has been my best companion since we got her.
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.

participant_2.background:
I work hard to provide for my family.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
I am a busy person who enjoys my downtime on weekends.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for fun?
I'm a busy person who enjoys my downtime on weekends. I like to spend time with friends and family, or just relax and read a book.
That sounds nice. I like to write and play my guitar. What's your favorite book?
I'm always up for a good book. I recently finished reading "The Martian" by Andy Weir and really enjoyed it.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out. I'm a big fan of sci-fi.
Me too! I'm looking forward to the new Star Wars movie coming out this year.
Me too! I'm a big fan of the Star Wars franchise. I've seen all of the movies and read all of the books.
I've seen all of the movies, but I haven't read any of the books. I should probably give them a try.
You definitely should! They're a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'll check them out.
No problem. What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to play video games and go hiking.
I like to play video games too. What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably Grand Theft Auto and Call of Duty.
I've played both of those games. They're a lot of fun.
Yeah, they are. What other games do you like to play?
I also like to play Minecraft and The Sims.
I've never played Minecraft, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun. You can build whatever you want.
That sounds cool. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'll give it a try.
